data.title: The Prince Perry Show: Freedom Fighter Podcast Ep 19: Roger O'Donnell

data.text:
I am very pleased to bring you this conversation with my old friend Roger O'Donnell.

Roger is a musician, composer, producer and Ferrari fanatic who you probably know as the keyboardist for The Cure, Psychedelic Furs and, before that, The Thompson Twins. Of course Rogers' work goes far beyond that and in this conversation we talk about his latest works, what inspires him and how he finds the freedom to achieve so much.

Topics we cover include:

The trap of success

Leaving The Cure

Uncle Otis Clothing Boutique

Finding Freedom and tapping into creativity

Driving Ferrari's

Favorite Mentors and who inspires us

Making a living from music
